post.description: Creates a new user account. Returns JWT token and user info. If email already exists (e.g., from OAuth), returns error message.
Authenticates user with email and password. Returns JWT token. OAuth users cannot login with password.
Sends a password reset link to the email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration. Link expires in 1 hour.
Reset password using the token from the reset link sent to email. Token is 64 characters and can only be used once.

delete.description: Permanently delete account and all data. Requires confirmation: "DELETE_MY_ACCOUNT". Email users must provide password.

get.description: Search for a user by EXACT email address to share folders with. Returns empty array if not found (prevents email enumeration).
Get user info by ID (for sharing preview).

post.description: Change password (email/password users only). OAuth users cannot change password.
Deactivate account (soft delete). Anonymizes user data but keeps records. Email users must provide password.
Google ID token ile kullanıcı girişi veya kaydı yapar
Apple identity token ile kullanıcı girişi veya kaydı yapar

get.description: Returns paginated list of folders. Use ?flat=true for flat list.

post.description: Create a new folder. Optionally specify parentId to create a subfolder.

put.description: Update folder properties. Can move folder to different parent by updating parentId. Prevents circular references.

get.description: Export attachments in the folder. Supports Excel.

post.description: Share a folder with another user by email. Permission levels: VIEW (read-only), EDIT (modify), CREATE (add new), FULL (all including delete).

get.description: List all folders that other users have shared with you. Filter by status (pending/accepted/rejected).
List all folders you have shared with other users.
Get the count of pending share invitations (useful for notifications badge).
List all users a folder is shared with. Only folder owner can access.

patch.description: Accept or reject a folder share invitation.
Update the permission level for an existing share. Only folder owner can update.

delete.description: Folder owner can revoke share, or shared user can leave the shared folder.

get.summary: List attachments with filters and pagination
get.description: List all attachments for the authenticated user. Supports filtering by folder, attachment type, title, amount range, currency, document date range, and text search across title, description and details fields. Uses cursor-based pagination.

post.summary: Get presigned URL for file upload
post.description: Returns a presigned URL for uploading files (images, PDFs, documents) to R2. Supported types: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, HEIC, PDF, Word, Excel.
Saves a file key to an attachment after upload. Validates ownership and key prefix.

get.description: Returns all files for a specific attachment with view URLs, filenames and content types. Validates ownership.
Streams the file directly for viewing. Validates ownership before serving. PDFs open inline in browser.
Downloads the file as attachment (forces download dialog in browser). Validates ownership.

delete.description: Deletes a file from storage and database. Validates ownership.

get.description: Get user notifications with pagination. Use unreadOnly=true to filter.
Get count of unread notifications (for badge).

post.description: Mark specific notifications or all as read.

post.summary: Generate QR session for web login
post.description: Creates a QR session that web app displays. Mobile scans and confirms. QR expires in 3 minutes.

qrData.description: JSON data to encode in QR

get.description: Web app polls this endpoint every 2 seconds to check if mobile confirmed the login.

post.description: Mobile app calls this after scanning QR code to authorize web login. Creates a new web session.

get.description: Returns all active web sessions for the authenticated user. Use this to show connected devices.

delete.description: Logs out the current web session regardless of session ID.
Logs out a specific web session. Restricted to mobile users.

post.description: Logs out all web sessions. Optionally exclude current session to stay logged in.

Analyzes a document (image or PDF) using Gemini AI and extracts structured data.

**Desteklenen Formatlar:**
- **Görsel:** JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
- **PDF:** application/pdf (çok sayfalı belgeler desteklenir)
- **NOT:** DOC/DOCX dosyaları desteklenmez, önce PDF'e dönüştürün

**Boyut Limitleri:**
- Görseller: maksimum 5MB
- PDF: maksimum 10MB

**Rate Limits:**
- 10 requests per minute
- 100 requests per day

**Request:**
- `file`: Base64 encoded dosya (görsel veya PDF) - zorunlu
- `mimeType`: Dosya MIME tipi (opsiyonel, varsayılan: image/jpeg)
  - Desteklenen: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/webp, application/pdf
- `attachmentTypeId`: Verilirse, AI o tipe özel alanları çıkarır

**Response:**
- `suggestedType`: Algılanan belge tipi ve güven skoru
- `suggestedTitle`: Önerilen başlık
- `suggestedDate`: Belge tarihi (ISO format)
- `extractedDetails`: AttachmentType fieldConfig'e uygun key-value çiftleri

**Kullanım:**
1. attachmentTypeId olmadan: AI belge tipini otomatik algılar
2. attachmentTypeId ile: Bilinen tip için daha doğru alan çıkarımı

mimeType.description: Dosya MIME tipi. Desteklenen formatlar: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/webp, application/pdf. Varsayılan: image/jpeg
